title: Portfolio
description: Developed a personal website to showcase professional skills, projects, and contact information.
Responsibilities:
- Created a responsive and interactive user interface using Next.js and React
- Implemented server-side functions to handle contact forms and dynamic content
- Integrated animations and styling with Styled-components libraries
- Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized performance
- Deployed and maintained the website on a personal server
Achievements: Achieved a perfect score of 100 across all Lighthouse parameters

title: SmileBar
description: Commercial team project by SoftRyzen. Role: Developer
Participated in the development of a website for a professional teeth whitening studio in Lviv.​
Responsibilities:
- Developed the "Advantages" and "FAQ" sections with tab functionality​
- Designed visual elements, including backgrounds and animations
- Configured styles in the tailwind.config file
- Collaborated with the team to resolve cross-browser issues and optimize the interface

title: Car Rental
description: - Developed a car rental service website offering convenient search and booking functionalities
- Implemented filters by brand, price, and mileage to facilitate car searches
- Developed functionality for adding cars to favorites for future booking
- Ensured responsive design for optimal display across various devices

title: Goose Track
description: Team-project. Role: Frontend Team Lead, Scrum Master, Developer.
Developed an event schedule management system with Google authentication support.
Responsibilities:
- Configured project structure.​
- Created markup and functionality for the monthly calendar.​
- As Scrum Master: set up and managed Trello board, participated in Agile methodology meetings.​
- As Frontend Team Lead: conducted code reviews for 9 frontend team members.

title: Phonebook
description: FullStack App
Developed a full-featured web application for storing and managing phone contacts with user authentication
Responsibilities:
- Developed the frontend using React to create an intuitive user interface.
- Created the backend with Node.js to handle requests and data storage
- Deployed the backend on a DigitalOcean server to ensure availability and stability
- Implemented functionality for adding, deleting, and filtering contacts by name
- Ensured a responsive design for proper display on various devices.
